name: Slug Down
description:
Try to survive in this crazy platform game! Can you make it to the leaderboard?

Fast food will make you bigger, fruits will make you smaller. Eat 3 of the fast food in a row to be able to eat the birds.

You can detach from balloons and birds by moving away from them. Watch out with the spikes in the ceiling! Some times they fall down!!

1-4 players coop.

Controls:

Player 1: Arrows
Player 2: Q,W
Player 3: O,P
Player 4: V,B
